page.title: 03Farming, Sollom
page.content:
Being reclaimed moss land the area is mainly arable,eg, potatoes, barley, corn (most), carrots, onions, peas, (some for cattle feed), with horticulture - tomatoes and salads. Milking cows and beef cattle. Ponies. Lord Lilford owns approximately 75% of the arable land, which incorporates woodland used for breeding game birds. One farm has installed the latest carousel milking parlour and a culbicle house for calf rearing, and another operates a carrot washing plant.
TRADE In the area there is one garage, numerous roadside produce stalls, one haulage contractor and a waste paper recycling depot.
